game_description: Get ready to step into the wild wild west in this gunslinging adventure. Arizona Ranger is a short action packed VR experience heavily inspired by the song Big Iron from artist, Marty Robbins. Take on the role of an Arizona Ranger hunting down an outlaw by the name of Texas Red. Prove yourself to the locals by shooting targets in timed challenges and best the rampant outlaws in the town of Agua Fria by defeating them in duels.
review_1: Yall did me right with this short and simple just like m duel with Texas Red. I love the dev
review_2: The difficulty level took me by surprise, but it was a good surprise and sucked me in despite the bandits have weird random shooting at the start of a round. Unfortunately, since the game let's you restart from where you died it should only take 5-10 minutes to complete the whole game.
